description.displayText: Ingrid worked full time for us and has been amazing with our two girls (4 years old and 1.5 years old). She took them to the park, play-dates, to and from school & activities and made them healthy meals. She is punctual and always sends plenty of photos and updates throughout the day. She also does light cleaning. I would definitely recommend her for a nanny position.
description.originalText: Ingrid worked full time for us and has been amazing with our two girls (4 years old and 1.5 years old). She took them to the park, play-dates, to and from school & activities and made them healthy meals. She is punctual and always sends plenty of photos and updates throughout the day. She also does light cleaning. I would definitely recommend her for a nanny position.

description.displayText:
Our family had three Au Pairs over a period of 5 years to take care of our 3 sons and Ingrid was the best by a mile.  
Our boys were 3, 4, and 10 while she was with us and she was great with them all both individually and together.  Ingrid is smart, works hard, drives well, and is 100% dependable.   She was great with the boys on an emotional level too and she gained their trust and affection very quickly.  Most impressively, Ingrid was able to teach them valuable skills on her own along the lines of cleaning up after themselves and general manners.

description.displayText: Ingrid has been our occasional babysitter for over a year. We have a two year old and Ingrid has always taken such good care of her. Whether it's doing an outdoor activity or playing indoors, Ingrid is able to keep her engaged for hours. She's helped out with serving meals and handling nap time independently and really well! We feel safe leaving our daughter in Ingrid's care. Ingrid is also always punctual and a great communicator. We plan to keep hiring her for our babysitting needs!
description.originalText: Ingrid has been our occasional babysitter for over a year. We have a two year old and Ingrid has always taken such good care of her. Ingrid (GG) is the kindest, most loving, responsible nanny! She took care of both of my sons (toddler and baby). She loves my kids like they are her own. She helped my sons meet all their milestones and even helped sleep train my newborn! As a mom, I never had to worry and knew my kids were being loved and cared for while I was at work. She is honest and trustworthy. Any family would be so lucky to have her! She is also an AMAZING photographer which means if you are lucky enough to work with GG you will have incredible photos of your children playing and having fun which is such a treasure!
